mods.title: Pen Lift
mods.description: So, maybe lasers aren't your thing and you prefer ink? Just install this pen lift mechanism that is a drop in replacement for the laser module.

mods.title: LightBurn Camera
mods.description: Use a calibrated camera view in LightBurn to accurately place your engravings!

mods.title: 4-inch Exhaust Adapter
mods.description: Is the 80mm exhaust fan and carbon filter just not cutting it? No worries, just print this 4-inch duct adapter and vent outside!
